articles.title: Social media trend mocks 'brief groping' ruling by Italian judge in sex assault case - Fox News
articles.description: An Italian judge’s ruling that sexual harassment doesn’t occur until 10 seconds have passed has caused outrage and prompted a trend on social media of Italians groping themselves to show just how long that is.

articles.description: Video of capture of Burmese python measured at 19ft – as long as an adult giraffe is tall – was posted on Instagram
